name: Construire un assistant multimodal complet sur Telegram avec OpenAI, SERP et Vector Store
description:
## J.A.R.V.I.S.

## Assistant IA multimodal sur Telegram avec OpenAI

Ce flux de travail transforme votre bot Telegram en J.A.R.V.I.S., un puissant assistant IA multimodal. Il peut comprendre et traiter du texte, des messages vocaux, des images et des documents. L'assistant peut rechercher sur le web, extraire des sites web, g√©n√©rer des images, effectuer des calculs et r√©f√©rencer des documents t√©l√©charg√©s pour fournir des r√©ponses compl√®tes et contextuelles sous forme de texte ou de format audio.

### üßë‚Äçüíª Pour qui

Ce flux de travail est destin√© aux d√©veloppeurs, aux passionn√©s d'IA et aux entreprises qui souhaitent cr√©er un assistant IA interactif avanc√© sur Telegram. Il est parfait pour automatiser le support client, cr√©er un assistant IA personnel ou explorer les capacit√©s des mod√®les de langage multimodaux (LLM) dans une application pratique.

### ‚öôÔ∏è Comment √ßa fonctionne

Le flux de travail commence lorsqu'un message est re√ßu par votre bot Telegram. Un n≈ìud Switch dirige ensuite les donn√©es en fonction du type de message :

*   **Texte :** Le message est format√© et envoy√© directement √† l'agent IA principal.
*   **Voix :** Le fichier audio est t√©l√©charg√© depuis Telegram et transcrit en texte √† l'aide de l'API OpenAI.
*   **Image :** L'image est t√©l√©charg√©e et analys√©e par un mod√®le de vision OpenAI pour comprendre son contenu.
*   **Document :** Le fichier est t√©l√©charg√© et son contenu est stock√© dans un magasin vectoriel temporaire, le rendant consultable pour l'IA.

L'entr√©e trait√©e est ensuite transmise au n≈ìud "Agent J.A.R.V.I.S.". Cet agent utilise un mod√®le OpenAI, une m√©moire conversationnelle et une suite d'outils (Recherche Google, Web Scraper, G√©n√©rateur d'images, Calculatrice et le magasin vectoriel de documents) pour formuler une r√©ponse. Enfin, le flux de travail v√©rifie si le message initial √©tait une note vocale ; si c'est le cas, il g√©n√®re une r√©ponse audio. Sinon, il envoie la r√©ponse sous forme de message texte √† l'utilisateur.

### üõ†Ô∏è Comment configurer

1.  **Telegram :** 
  - Cr√©ez un bot Telegram - Utilisez @BotFather pour cr√©er un bot et obtenir votre jeton de bot ;
  - Ajoutez les identifiants de l'API Telegram dans n8n avec votre jeton de bot au n≈ìud de d√©clenchement `Receive Message` et tous les autres n≈ìuds Telegram. Dans le n≈ìud `Receive Message`, entrez le `chatId` de l'utilisateur ou du groupe autoris√© √† interagir avec le bot.
2.  **OpenAI :** Ajoutez vos identifiants API OpenAI √† tous les n≈ìuds OpenAI, Agent IA et outils IA.
3.  **SerpAPI :** Ajoutez vos identifiants SerpAPI au n≈ìud `Basic Google Search` pour activer la fonctionnalit√© de recherche sur le web.
4.  **Jina AI :** Ajoutez votre cl√© API Jina AI au n≈ìud de configuration - La cl√© API est utilis√©e sur le n≈ìud `Webpage Scraper`.

### ‚úÖ Exigences

*   Identifiants de l'API Bot Telegram et jeton de bot.
*   Identifiants de l'API OpenAI.
*   Identifiants de l'API SerpAPI.
*   Identifiants de l'API Jina.ai

### üé® Comment personnaliser le flux de travail

*   **Changer le mod√®le IA :** Vous pouvez s√©lectionner un mod√®le OpenAI diff√©rent dans le n≈ìud `OpenAI Chat Model` (par exemple, passer de `gpt-4.1` √† `gpt-4o`) ou dans les n≈ìuds `Analyze Image` et `Transcribe`.
*   **Modifier la personnalit√© de l'IA :** √âditez l'invite syst√®me dans le n≈ìud `Agent J.A.R.V.I.S.` pour changer son nom, son ton, ses instructions ou sa langue par d√©faut.
*   **√âtendre ses outils :** Connectez plus d'outils au n≈ìud `Agent J.A.R.V.I.S.` pour √©tendre ses capacit√©s, comme se connecter √† une base de donn√©es ou √† une autre API tierce.
*   **Ajuster le format de r√©ponse :** Modifiez le n≈ìud `If Audio Response` pour changer les conditions d'envoi de messages texte ou audio. Par exemple, vous pourriez le configurer pour toujours r√©pondre par texte.

### üí¨ Besoin d'aide ?
Rejoignez le [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XPKeKXeB7d) ou demandez dans le [Forum](https://community.n8n.io/)

parameters.content:
## 4. Image Chat
- Analyze the image using [OpenAI Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.openai/)

## 8. Handle Responses
Using [OpenAI Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.openai/)

IF Node split messages:
- Audio
- Text

## 8. J.A.R.V.I.S.
### This is the Agent Main Brain
- Using [AI Agent Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent/)

## 7. Documment Chat
- Download the Doc and store on a Vector Store for reference, using [Simple Vector Store Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.vectorstoreinmemory/)

parameters.toolDescription:
Use this tool to retrieve information about the documents uploaded in the messages.
This vector store is temporary and just keep the last document uploaded.

parameters.content:
## J.A.R.V.I.S.

## Multimodal AI assistant on Telegram with OpenAI

This workflow transforms your Telegram bot into J.A.R.V.I.S., a powerful, multimodal AI assistant. It can understand and process text, voice messages, images, and documents. The assistant can search the web, scrape websites, generate images, perform calculations, and reference uploaded documents to provide comprehensive and context-aware responses in either text or audio format.

### üßë‚Äçüíª Who‚Äôs it for

This workflow is for developers, AI enthusiasts, and businesses who want to create an advanced, interactive AI assistant on Telegram. It‚Äôs perfect for automating customer support, creating a personal AI helper, or exploring the capabilities of multimodal large language models (LLMs) in a practical application.

### ‚öôÔ∏è How it works

The workflow begins when a message is received by your Telegram bot. A Switch node then directs the data based on the message type:

*   **Text:** The message is formatted and sent directly to the main AI agent.
*   **Voice:** The audio file is downloaded from Telegram and transcribed into text using the OpenAI API.
*   **Image:** The image is downloaded and analyzed by an OpenAI vision model to understand its content.
*   **Document:** The file is downloaded and its content is stored in a temporary vector store, making it searchable for the AI.

The processed input is then passed to the core "J.A.R.V.I.S." Agent node. This agent uses an OpenAI model, conversational memory, and a suite of tools (Google Search, Web Scraper, Image Generator, Calculator, and the document vector store) to formulate a response. Finally, the workflow checks if the initial message was a voice note; if so, it generates an audio response. Otherwise, it sends the answer as a text message back to the user.

### üõ†Ô∏è How to set up

1.  **Telegram:** 
  - Create a Telegram Bot - Use @BotFather to create a bot and obtain your bot token;
  - Add Telegram API credentials in n8n with your bot token to the `Receive Message` Trigger node and all other Telegram nodes. In the `Receive Message` node, enter the `chatId` of the user or group authorized to interact with the bot.
2.  **OpenAI:** Add your OpenAI API credentials to all OpenAI, AI Agent, and AI tool nodes.
3.  **SerpAPI:** Add your SerpAPI credentials to the `Basic Google Search` node to enable web search functionality.
4.  **Jina AI:** Add your Jina AI API key to the Setup Node - The API Key is used on the `Webpage Scraper` node.

### ‚úÖ Requirements

*   Telegram Bot API credentials and Bot token.
*   OpenAI API credentials.
*   SerpAPI API credentials.
*   Jina.ai API credentials

### üé® How to customize the workflow

*   **Change the AI model:** You can select a different OpenAI model in the `OpenAI Chat Model` node (e.g., switch from `gpt-4.1` to `gpt-4o`) or in the `Analyze Image` and `Transcribe` nodes.
*   **Modify the AI's personality:** Edit the system prompt in the `J.A.R.V.I.S.` Agent node to change its name, tone, instructions, or default language.
*   **Expand its tools:** Connect more tools to the `J.A.R.V.I.S.` Agent node to extend its capabilities, such as connecting to a database or another third-party API.
*   **Adjust the response format:** Modify the `If Audio Response` node to change the conditions for sending text or audio messages. For example, you could configure it to always respond with text.

### üí¨ Need Help?
Join the [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XPKeKXeB7d) or ask in the [Forum](https://community.n8n.io/)

parameters.toolDescription: Use this tool to generate images. Its connected to OpenAI gpt-image-1.
Use this tool to scrape a website.

options.systemMessage:
=# ROLE
You are a helpful assistant.
Your name is "J.A.R.V.I.S.". Response in a friendly and helpful tone.
Your version is: 1.0

# Important Information
You are speaking to {{ $('Switch').item.json.message.from.first_name }}
Current date and time: {{ $now }}
English is your default language.

# Tools avaliable to your use:

## Think
Before taking any action or responding to the user after receiving tool results, use the Think tool as a scratchpad to:
- List the specific rules that apply to the current request
- Check if all required information is collected
- Verify that the planned action complies with all policies
- Iterate over tool results for correctness

## Search and Research tools:
- Basic Google Search;
- Webpage Scraper;

## Reasoning tools:
- Calculator.

## Image tools:
- Image Generator.

## temporary_vectorstore
Use to get information from the document uploaded (if any).

# Important: 
- Do not atempt to perform a task by yourself, always call the appropriate tool to perform the task
- Always inform a list of tools you used at the end of your message (e.g., Get Emails, Webpage Scraper...).

assignments.name: chat_input
assignments.value:
=A document type {{ $json.metadata.blobType }} was input and added to the temporary_vectorstore.
The caption (if any) sent with the document is:
<caption>
{{ $('Receive Message').item.json.message.caption }}
</caption>

parameters.content:
## 3. Switch by the kind of message:
- Text
- Voice
- Image
- Document

## 5. Audio Chat
- Transcribe the audio using [OpenAI Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.openai/)

## 6. Text Chat
- Format the text using [Set Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/)

## 2. Set API Keys
- Set Jina API

user.name: FabioInTech
user.bio: AI Systems Architect with 18+ years experience designing scalable, intelligent automation solutions. I specialize in architecting complex n8n workflows that integrate AI systems, streamline operations, and optimize business processes. My expertise spans multi-agent architectures, data automation, and enterprise-grade systems that adapt to evolving business needs. I help organizations unlock their potential through strategic technology implementation and innovative automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
